explains: adv. 自发地，不由自主地；自然地

sentences.en: Many people spontaneously stood up and cheered.
sentences.cn: 许多人自发地站起来欢呼。

sentences.en: It's whether a species has developed this ability spontaneously.
sentences.cn: 是一个物种是否自发地发展了这种能力。

sentences.en: They spontaneously embrace and are linked forever if the book lasts forever.
sentences.cn: 他们不由自主地相拥，只要作品永存，他们就永不分离。
